name: XWUI Sidebar Component
description: Sidebar navigation component for displaying navigation menus in a side panel. Supports left/right positioning, collapsible mode, custom widths, header and footer sections. Uses XWUIMenu internally.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

collapsible.description: Whether the sidebar can be collapsed

collapsed.description: Whether the sidebar is initially collapsed

width.description: Width of the sidebar when expanded (CSS value)

collapsedWidth.description: Width of the sidebar when collapsed (CSS value)

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the sidebar

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

items.description: Array of menu items to display in the sidebar

header.description: Header element or HTML string for the sidebar

footer.description: Footer element or HTML string for the sidebar
